FEATURES.FEATURES_1: translation of the word, its audio pronunciation and definition in 16 languages: Arabic, Brazilian, Chinese, Czech, Dutch, English, French, German, Hindi, Italian, Japanese, Korean, Russian, Slovak, Turkish, Spanish
FEATURES.FEATURES_2: the system supports only translations for other languages
FEATURES.FEATURES_5: loading and adding words from texts
FEATURES.FEATURES_9: communication through comments is available on each page, Telegram and Discord

ABOUT.FEEDBACK: If you have any questions and suggestions, please write to telegram, discord, comments (yes, we read them)

IN_DEVELOPMENT.IN_DEVELOPMENT_1: you can download all added words
IN_DEVELOPMENT.IN_DEVELOPMENT_2: download files and words from them (books, .txt, subtitles)

MONETIZATION.ADDITIONAL_TEXT: Collectible card game (collectible cards), game currency, gaming market. You can buy, sell, exchange unique word-cards. For regular training users will receive cards. Super rare cards may have abilities, such as discounts on the card market, an increased chance of dropping more rare cards, etc.
MONETIZATION.DESCRIPTION: Weâ€™re looking for ways to monetize the project in order to pay for servers and to hire developers. The current plan is:
MONETIZATION.MAIN_TEXT: Free and paid accounts (freemium). Paid subscription with additional functionality or free accounts with reduced functionality.

PLANS.PLAN_11: calculation of the difficulty of memorizing a word, showing its complexity factor
PLANS.PLAN_13: a book reader from which you can add words or an application assistant when reading paper books, i.e. alphabetical list of words from the book in the phone, where you can pry while reading
PLANS.PLAN_2: browser extension to add words from the page
PLANS.PLAN_3: notification when it is time to train
PLANS.PLAN_5: puzzle game with words (time trial, crossword)
PLANS.PLAN_6: ability to create professional categories and groups where the teacher gives words to study, monitors and sees students process
PLANS.PLAN_8: thematic word sets, as in Anki

SOCIAL_MODEL.SOCIAL_MODEL_3: without discounts and sales, the price of a subscription will always be acceptable according to the region

TITLE.NAME: aeflip.com
TITLE.TEXT: is a single global platform to learn and train a foreign language vocabulary through interval repetitions.

LANDING.DESCRIPTION: Finally, a centralized place to learn and train our foreign words

NO-CONTENT.SUB-HEADER: The page you are looking for cannot be found. Click here to return |back| or to |the home page|.

NO-RESULTS.MESSAGE: Sorry! We couldn't find any results.

PROFILE.CHANGE_EMAIL: Please, contact us if you want to change your email address. For now, it's not possible to do on the page.

TRAINING.NOTE_TOOLTIP: Click on the row to see your note
TRAINING.RANDOM_10_WORDS: Push to add 10 random words for training

WORDS_LIST.ADD_WORDS: Add as many words as you want
